sense.gloss: contacting, (making) contact, getting in touch, communication, correspondence, call, message
connection (with a train, bus, etc.), joining (a railway line, etc.), meeting
connection (between matters, incidents, etc.), relation, link
to twine, to get tangled, to get entangled, to get caught (in)
to be involved (e.g. of money in a matter), to get involved (in), to be a factor (in), to have an influence
to pick a quarrel (with), to find fault (with), to pester, to hassle
illogical jump, drawing a hasty inference (between two events), jumping to conclusions, acting rashly
logical connection, chain of reasoning, coherence, context

r_ele.r: くうぐんれんらくしょうこう
こうほうれんらくせん

sense.gloss: contacting, getting in touch, communication, call, message

sdata.j: あなたは↑今夜↑↓こんや↓↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑家↑↓いえ↓で、↑彼↑↓かれ↓と↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓をとることができます。
sdata.e: You can get in touch with him at his home tonight.

sdata.j: あなたは↑今晩↑↓こんばん↓↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑家↑↓いえ↓で↑彼↑↓かれ↓と↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓が↑取↑↓と↓れる。
sdata.e: You can get in touch with him at his home tonight.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓になんとか↑電話↑↓でんわ↓で↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓をとろうとしたのですが、↑駄目↑↓だめ↓でした。
sdata.e: I tried to reach you on the phone, but I was unable to get through.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓↑先↑↓さき↓↑住所↑↓じゅうしょ↓を↑教↑↓おし↓えてください。
sdata.e: Please give me your permanent address.

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓いうちにご↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓くださるのをお↑待↑↓ま↓ちしております。
sdata.e: I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓いうちに↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓します。
sdata.e: I'll get in touch with you soon.

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓いうちにご↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓↑下↑↓くだ↓さるのをお↑待↑↓ま↓ちしています。
sdata.e: I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓いうちにこちらから↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓します。
sdata.e: You'll be hearing from us soon.

sdata.j: ↑緊急↑↓きんきゅう↓↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓↑先↑↓さき↓は↑何↑↓なん↓↑番↑↓ばん↓ですか。
sdata.e: What is the emergency telephone number?

sdata.j: ↑緊急↑↓きんきゅう↓の↑時↑↓とき↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑代理人↑↓だいりにん↓に↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓をとってください。
sdata.e: In case of an emergency, get in touch with my agent.

words.gloss: contacting, (making) contact, getting in touch, communication, correspondence, call, message
